cont.entity_a: Effective heating for large spaces; two units can raise temperatures significantly in an uninsulated garage. Maintains comfortable temperatures even in cold weather.
cont.entity_b: Works well for heating a garage to prevent water lines from freezing. Efficient for smaller spaces.

cont.entity_a: Requires hardwiring and cannot be plugged into a standard outlet. Installation is generally easy, but the mounting bar is flimsy for wall installation.
cont.entity_b: Installation can be challenging without proper electrical setup.

cont.entity_a: Some units arrive defective or have quality control issues.
cont.entity_b: Build quality is decent but can have thermostat issues.

cont.entity_a: The fan delay can be an issue, but the unit is quiet when operating.
cont.entity_b: Noisy operation with rattling issues reported.

cont.entity_a: Connected to a thermostat for better temperature control. Thermostat control is not very accurate.
